title: Highschool of the Dead: Drifters of the Dead
synopsis: After escaping the zombie-infested mainland, Takashi Komuro and the gang find themselves on a remote island off the coast of Tokonosu City. While scavenging around the island for supplies, they encounter a small seaside shack that provides them with clothing and a place to rest for the night. After a day's work of collecting food, they begin to cook what they have gathered.
characters: ['Busujima, Saeko', 'Miyamoto, Rei', 'Komuro, Takashi', 'Hirano, Kouta', 'Takagi, Saya', 'Marikawa, Shizuka', 'Maresato, Alice', 'Zeke']
voices: ['Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Inoue, Marina', 'Suwabe, Junichi', 'Hiyama, Nobuyuki', 'Kitamura, Eri', 'Fukui, Yukari', 'Taketatsu, Ayana']
